item.title: AWX and execution/hop nodes, how hard can it be? - Part 1
item.description: Intro and disclaimer With the migration of AWX to k8s (with the awx-operator) I kind of gotten stuck because I lost some connectivity to my test enviroment (AKS in azure and ansible “clients” in my homelab). Yes I could fix the network but with with the release of ansible-receptor I should be able to just deploy a execution node in my homelab and execute everything from the execution node. How hard can it be?
